pageContent: Purpose of review: The ability to accurately localize and target prostate cancer, whether for staging or future interventions, is an important concept in prostate cancer management. In this review, we describe the emerging technologies that allow for enhanced visualization and precise targeting of the prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Treatments for Metastatic Prostate Cancer (mPC): A Review of Costing Evidence
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/28756597/
